resources.string: Please hang tight while we craft a unique masterpiece for you

1. Introduction
This Privacy Policy explains how Wallatopia ("we," "our," or "us") collects, uses, and protects your personal information when using our App.
2. Information We Collect
The App does not collect personal data.
Some anonymous usage data (e.g., app performance) may be collected for analytics.
3. Third-Party Services
We use Pixabay, Pexels, and Pollinations AI to provide wallpapers.
These services may have their own privacy policies:
Pixabay: https://pixabay.com/
Pexels: https://www.pexels.com/
Pollinations AI

Welcome to Wallatopia ("App," "we," "our," or "us"). By using this App, you agree to these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree, please do not use the App.
1. Use of the App
Wallatopia provides wallpapers sourced from Pixabay API, Pexels API, and Pollinations AI API.
You are granted a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use the App for personal, non-commercial purposes.
You may not misuse, modify, or redistribute the content unlawfully.
2. Third-Party APIs and Content
The App integrates content from Pixabay, Pexels, and Pollinations AI.
We do not own the wallpapers provided by these services. Please review their licensing terms:
Pixabay: https://pixabay.com/
Pexels: https://www.pexels.com/
Pollinations AI
You are responsible for verifying image usage rights.
3. Limitation of Liability
We are not responsible for copyright claims or misuse of content.
The App is provided "as is" with no guarantees.
